descriptionHtml:
[b][center]




[size=5][color=#e06666]There are very few female Imperial Npcs to marry in skyrim so I made this mod which makes Adelasia who works for the East Empire Company in Windhelm, marriageable, younger and better then ever, you have to finish the Quest Rise in the East.[/color]
[/size]


[u][color=#ffffff][size=5]Note:[/size][/color][/u]



[color=#e06666][size=4][b]If you have any Suggestions for an NPC you would like to change or marry and you can't please make a post or send me a message if it's possible then it will be done.


[/b]No DLC or mods required.
[/size][/color]


[u][color=#ffffff][size=5]My other mods:


[/size][/color][/u]
